title: Pixel 2XL running Android 11 shuts down every time I plug on the battery or headphones! HELP!
content:
I have tried cleaning all my cables and ports, including the phone's. Nothing has changed. Previous owner says I has happened to him before, on an android 10 update, but that it had stopped after the 11beta.

I bought the phone recently, used. However the phone is completely intact, no damage to the outside or screen. I live in Brazil, so since the phone was bought outside of the country and brought in, there are no repair shops that deal with the brand or change/replace parts. This has become so annoying in fact, I have to plug the phone in about 20-30 times until it charges without turning off and ending up in a on/off cycle.

HELP!
